trans-unit.source: This topics in this document describe how you can use features of the [!INCLUDE[ise_1](../Token/ise_1_md.md)] to be more productive.
trans-unit.target: This topics in this document describe how you can use features of the [!INCLUDE[ise_1](../Token/ise_1_md.md)] to be more productive.

trans-unit.target: How to Use Tab Completion in the Script Pane and Console Pane

trans-unit.target: Provides the steps to perform tab completion in both the Script Pane and the Console Pane.
